column4: I am using ubuntu 10.04 version in my vps. When my server is idle it uses 250MB Ram. But earlier it only uses 50 - 60MB when my server is in idle state. Can you provide me any information regarding this.
get a htop to see what is taking the memory?
i sadi you acan look up what process is holding the memory with htop, or even ps command
probably just cache buffer then, if no other process is holding the memory.
